title: Game Scoop Episode 593
description: Super Mario 3D All-Stars, Super Mario Bros. 35, Avengers, Flight Simulator, Ninja Gaiden 2, and more. The transition music in this episode is from Mega Man 4, and the outro track is Daemon's song "Come On Human."
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (IGN)
content:encoded: Super Mario 3D All-Stars, Super Mario Bros. 35, Avengers, Flight Simulator, Ninja Gaiden 2, and more. The transition music in this episode is from Mega Man 4, and the outro track is Daemon's song "Come On Human."
